lines.text: [Myles is going to light a cigarette]
Oh, throw that disgusting cylinder away!
We could use a new brand of Scotch. This tastes like a poor man's kilt.
[after smashing a headlight with a wrench]
Oh, by the way, someone smashed one of the headlights. You shouldn't leave the Rolls out there in plain view. This neighborhood is full of rich teenaged bastards.
People should be born at the age of 70 and live their life backwards.
I've changed my perfume... It's called Shalimar... You like it?
